item.title: Configure libvirt with openvswitch bridge
item.description: Create OpenvSwitch bridge ovs-vsctl add-br br0 Configure libvirt with br0 just created BRNAME=br0 cat > /tmp/libvirt-net.xml <<EOF <network> <name>${BRNAME}</name> <forward mode='bridge'/> <bridge name='${BRNAME}'/> <virtualport type='openvswitch'/> </network> EOF virsh net-define /tmp/libvirt-net.xml virsh net-start $BRNAME virsh net-autostart $BRNAME

item.title: Using OpenvSwitch to build minimal linux networking hack environment
item.description: Create Openvswitch bridge and two tap devices for vm ip tuntap add name tap1 mode tap ip tuntap add name tap2 mode tap ip link set tap1 up ip link set tap2 up ovs-vsctl add-br br0 ovs-vsctl add-port br0 tap1 ovs-vsctl add-port br0 tap2 Start the two vms and config network configure vm01 start vm01 qemu-system-x86_64 -nographic \ -kernel ./bzImage -initrd ./initramfs \ -append "console=ttyS0 quiet" \ -netdev tap,id=net1,ifname=tap1,script=no,downscript=no \ -device e1000,netdev=net1,mac='9e:11:24:5c:35:89' configure vm01 network ip link set eth0 up ip addr add 192.

item.title: Compile OpenvSwitch 2.5.x LST from source code
item.description: Install compile dependencies Configure and compile the source code ./configure --with-linux=/lib/modules/$(uname -r)/build --prefix=/src/ovs make -j$(nproc) make install && make modules_install Load OpenvSwitch module modprobe gre modprobe openvswitch modprobe libcrc32c Configure ovsdb /src/ovs/bin/ovsdb-tool create /src/ovs/etc/openvswitch/conf.db /src/ovs/share/openvswitch/vswitch.ovsschema Start OVS Start ovsdb-server without ssl /src/ovs/sbin/ovsdb-server --remote=punix:/src/ovs/var/run/openvswitch/db.sock \ --remote=db:Open_vSwitch,Open_vSwitch,manager_options \ --pidfile --detach --log-file with ssl /src/ovs/sbin/ovsdb-server --remote=punix:/src/ovs/var/run/openvswitch/db.sock \ --remote=db:Open_vSwitch,Open_vSwitch,manager_options \ --private-key=db:Open_vSwitch,SSL,private_key \ --certificate=db:Open_vSwitch,SSL,certificate \ --bootstrap-ca-cert=db:Open_vSwitch,SSL,ca_cert \ --pidfile --detach --log-file View /src/ovs/var/log/openvswitch/ovsdb-server.
